trans-unit.source: This document provides an example of using Azure PowerShell to submit Pig jobs to a Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This document provides an example of using Azure PowerShell to submit Pig jobs to a Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Pig allows you to write MapReduce jobs by using a language (Pig Latin,) that models data transformations, rather than map and reduce functions.
trans-unit.target: Pig allows you to write MapReduce jobs by using a language (Pig Latin,) that models data transformations, rather than map and reduce functions.

trans-unit.source: Run Pig jobs using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Run Pig jobs using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell provides *cmdlets* that allow you to remotely run Pig jobs on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell provides *cmdlets* that allow you to remotely run Pig jobs on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this is accomplished by using REST calls to [WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) (formerly called Templeton) running on the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Internally, this is accomplished by using REST calls to [WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) (formerly called Templeton) running on the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: The following cmdlets are used when running Pig jobs on a remote HDInsight cluster:
trans-unit.target: The following cmdlets are used when running Pig jobs on a remote HDInsight cluster:

trans-unit.source: **Login-AzureRmAccount**: Authenticates Azure PowerShell to your Azure Subscription
trans-unit.target: **Login-AzureRmAccount**: Authenticates Azure PowerShell to your Azure Subscription

trans-unit.source: **New-AzureRmHDInsightPigJobDefinition**: Creates a new *job definition* by using the specified Pig Latin statements
trans-unit.target: **New-AzureRmHDInsightPigJobDefinition**: Creates a new *job definition* by using the specified Pig Latin statements

trans-unit.source: **Start-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Sends the job definition to HDInsight, starts the job, and returns a *job* object that can be used to check the status of the job
trans-unit.target: **Start-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Sends the job definition to HDInsight, starts the job, and returns a *job* object that can be used to check the status of the job

trans-unit.source: **Wait-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Uses the job object to check the status of the job.
trans-unit.target: **Wait-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Uses the job object to check the status of the job.

trans-unit.source: It will wait until the job has completed, or the wait time has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: It will wait until the job has completed, or the wait time has been exceeded.

trans-unit.source: **Get-AzureRmHDInsightJobOutput**: Used to retrieve the output of the job
trans-unit.target: **Get-AzureRmHDInsightJobOutput**: Used to retrieve the output of the job
